title: Revelations From Governor's Fiancee Show Flair For Scandal In Oregon
teaser: On Thursday, Oregon's first lady, Cylvia Hayes, admitted to receiving $5,000 to marry a man who wanted a green card. NPR's Scott Simon talks to political editor Charlie Mahtesian about the scandal.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
